overview:
Casey Klebba is a seasoned designer/developer with startup, in-house, and agency experience.

In 2002, Casey was the lead designer and front-end engineer for a school sponsored open source social networking platform that served the students of the University of Oklahoma, Baylor, and the College of William and Mary. After graduating with a degree in Visual Communication, Casey began his professional career at Disney Online, where he contributed to Disneyworld.com, Disneyland.com, and Disneyparks.com.

Following Disney, Casey became the Creative Director and lead front-end engineer for another social networking platform. As the first employee of online entertainment startup EQAL, Casey was responsible for the oversight and delivery of all front-end design and code. Additionally he contributed to the company’s branding, sales, marketing, system architecture, and product design.

Currently, Casey is a Senior Interactive Developer at Sapient in Los Angeles. His clients include Sony, Dolby, Target, Union Bank, Citi, The Hartford, California Tourism & Trade Commission, Bare Escentuals, HondaJet, Crystal Cruises, The Marine Mammal Center and Rhino Records.
